arts.ttl: FPL notes: Jackson + Palmer star, leaky Villa, Amazing Amad
arts.sum: We look back on Chelsea 3-0 Aston Villa and Man Utd 4-0 Everton The post FPL notes: Jackson + Palmer star, leaky Villa, Amazing Amad appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Chelsea injury news: Enzo Maresca left ruing Wesley Fofana blow in win over Aston Villa
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca reveals the length of time in which he expects Wesley Fofana to be absent after the centre-back sustained an injury against Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Chelsea's Cole Palmer pokes fun at Morgan Rogers on social media after Aston Villa defeat
arts.sum: In the screenshot, which was posted to Palmer's official Instagram page, Rogers wrote: "No goals against Villa." The Chelsea star then responded: "Player of match [award] is comin[g] back with me." Not long after full-time, Palmer posted an image of his man-of-the-match award alongside a screenshot of the conversation to rub salt into the wounds of his close pal.

arts.ttl: Cole Palmer reveals cheeky conversation with Morgan Rogers before his man-of-the-match winning performance in Chelsea's win over Aston Villa
arts.sum: Following the game Palmer revealed that the two England internationals had engaged in some pre-match banter over Snapchat earlier this week.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca delivers Premier League title verdict after Chelsea victory over Aston Villa
arts.sum: After a comfortable 3-0 win over Aston Villa, Enzo Maresca was asked about Chelsea's Premier League title challenge.

arts.ttl: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca brutally rules out title challenge after Aston Villa triumph
arts.sum: Chelsea continued their fine form under Enzo Maresca with an impressive 3-0 win over Aston Villa - but the Italian still doesn't see his team challenging for the title this season

arts.ttl: Chelsea dealt injury blow with Wesley Fofana suffering hamstring problem in win over Aston Villa - as Enzo Maresca reveals how long he will be absent
arts.sum: KIERAN GILL AT STAMFORD BRIDGE: Chelsea have been dealt the blow of potentially losing Wesley Fofana for the entire winter period after the 23-year-old picked up a problem.

arts.ttl: ‚ÄòThey are‚Äô: Unai Emery has spotted a big change Chelsea have made under Enzo Maresca
Enzo Maresca channels his inner Unai Emery after Chelsea hammer Aston Villa
arts.sum: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca has highlighted the need for his team to gain experience to truly contend for the Premier League title, even after a rousing 3-0 win against Aston Villa. However, just as Unai Emery did last season when Villa shocked everyone to finish in the top four, Maresca was keen to play things down.

arts.ttl: Thomas Frank reveals Brentford injury blow before Aston Villa trip
arts.sum: Brentford have now scored 26 goals in 13 league matches this season, which is one of the best records in the division and an achievement Frank is very pleased with. ‚ÄúThose who‚Äôve followed us in the Championship, the two years before the play-off finals we scored the most goals in the Championship so it‚Äôs always been the aim to be offensive and positive, and after four years in the Premier League I don‚Äôt think we‚Äôve been good at scoring goals but this year we‚Äôre on another level and have more or less all our offensive players available.‚Äù
